name: Measoning
tag_list: food, crowdsourcing-food, blog, blogs, making-money-online, food-2-0, recipes, cooking
overview:
Measoning.com allows users to put their seasoning creation on the market.

“Submit your seasoning recipes. Measoning sorts and picks your submissions. These recipes are publicly posted in Recipes. Comment and rate them.

At the end of the month, Measoning picks the best recipe from Recipes. The winner will have their recipe bottled and sold for one month; the winner receives royalties.

At the end of the year, Measoning compares all 12 monthly seasonings. One seasoning will be chosen to become an official Measoning; the winner receives royalties.”
